page.title: 03FARM ANIMALS-TEANASSIE
page.content: The owners of Cluaine-an-Teanassie Deer Farm also keep 150 head of cattle including Aberdeen Angus(beef breed),Dexters and one Shetland cow.There are also sheep and goats on the farm.The sheep are of the Shetland species, and their fleece is sold to people who do hand spinning. The goats are feral and have very valuable wool which is used for making Cashmere goods. This type of goat eats different things from other animals and its favourite food is weeds. An experiment is presently taking place to find out just how many types of plants these goats do eat.
